channel.title: Oil and gas on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Oil and gas on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Wellstream Logo Wellstream Holdings plc is a British company which designs and manufactures flexible pipeline systems for the oil and gas industry. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and was a constituent of the FTSE 250 Index before being acquired by General Electric in February 2011. Source
You can download theWellstreamlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Wellstream
item.description: Wellstream Holdings plc is a British company which designs and manufactures flexible pipeline systems for the oil and gas industry. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and was a constituent of the FTSE 250 Index before being acquired by General Electric in February 2011. Source

<! [CDATA[
Hunting plc Logo Hunting plc is a British-based supplier to the oil and gas industry. Some 27% of the business is owned by the Hunting family. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange. Source
You can download theHuntinglogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Hunting
item.description: Hunting plc is a British-based supplier to the oil and gas industry. Some 27% of the business is owned by the Hunting family. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Bashneft Logo
Bashneft is a Russian oil company formed by the transfer of the oil related assets of the Soviet oil ministry in Bashkortostan to the regional government of the Republic of Bashkortostan by Boris Yeltsin. It was then privatized during 2002-3 by Murtaza Rakhimov, the president of Bashkortostan, an ally of Yeltsin’s, with a controlling interest in Bashkir Capital, a holding company controlled by Rakhimov’s son, Ural Rakhimov. In 2009 a controlling interest in Bashneft was acquired for $2 billion by Vladimir Yevtushenkov and placed in his holding company, Sistema, but in July 2014 he was jailed and 72% of Sistema’s interest in Bashneft seized by the Russian government.
You can download theBashneftlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Bashneft
item.description: Bashneft is a Russian oil company formed by the transfer of the oil related assets of the Soviet oil ministry in Bashkortostan to the regional government of the Republic of Bashkortostan by Boris Yeltsin. It was then privatized during 2002-3 by Murtaza Rakhimov, the president of Bashkortostan, an ally of Yeltsin’s, with a controlling interest in Bashkir Capital, a holding company controlled by Rakhimov’s son, Ural Rakhimov. In 2009 a controlling interest in Bashneft was acquired for $2 billion by Vladimir Yevtushenkov and placed in his holding company, Sistema, but in July 2014 he was jailed and 72% of Sistema’s interest in Bashneft seized by the Russian government.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Abu Dhabi National Oil Company Logo The Abu Dhabi National Oil Company or ADNOC is the state-owned oil company of the United Arab Emirates. It is the world’s 12th largest oil company by production, producing 3.1 million barrels per day, with plans to increase production capacity to 4 million bpd by the end of 2020. It is the UAE’s largest oil company. Source
You can download theADNOClogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: ADNOC
item.description: The Abu Dhabi National Oil Company or ADNOC is the state-owned oil company of the United Arab Emirates. It is the world’s 12th largest oil company by production, producing 3.1 million barrels per day, with plans to increase production capacity to 4 million bpd by the end of 2020. It is the UAE’s largest oil company. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Anonima Petroli Italiana Logo
Anonima Petroli Italiana or simply api is a large oil company in Italy. It is a provider of crude oil for the petrochemical industry and a distributor of petroleum products. It is the most important subsidiary of the holding company Gruppo api, which also includes api Raffineria di Ancona SpA, api Energia SpA, Festival SpA, apioil Ltd, api GmbH and api Services Ltd. It is headquartered in Rome, Italy.
You can download theAPIlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: API
item.description: Anonima Petroli Italiana or simply api is a large oil company in Italy. It is a provider of crude oil for the petrochemical industry and a distributor of petroleum products. It is the most important subsidiary of the holding company Gruppo api, which also includes api Raffineria di Ancona SpA, api Energia SpA, Festival SpA, apioil Ltd, api GmbH and api Services Ltd. It is headquartered in Rome, Italy.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 ARC Resources Logo
ARC Resources is a Canadian oil and gas producer based in Calgary, Alberta, the second largest Canadian oil and gas trust as of 2010. ARC was founded in 1996 as a royalty trust with the acquisition of 21 properties from Mobil Oil Canada. The acquisition was funded by an initial IPO of $180 million on the Toronto Stock Exchange. The company operated as a royalty trust from inception in 1996 until December 31, 2010.
You can download theARClogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: ARC
item.description: ARC Resources is a Canadian oil and gas producer based in Calgary, Alberta, the second largest Canadian oil and gas trust as of 2010. ARC was founded in 1996 as a royalty trust with the acquisition of 21 properties from Mobil Oil Canada. The acquisition was funded by an initial IPO of $180 million on the Toronto Stock Exchange. The company operated as a royalty trust from inception in 1996 until December 31, 2010.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
BG Group Logo
BG Group plc was a British multinational oil and gas company headquartered in Reading, United Kingdom. On 8 April 2015, Royal Dutch Shell announced that it had reached an agreement to acquire BG Group for $70 billion, subject to regulatory and shareholder agreement. The sale was completed on 15 February 2016. Prior to the takeover, BG Group was listed on the London Stock Exchange and was a constituent of the FTSE 100 Index.
You can download theBG Grouplogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: BG Group
item.description: BG Group plc was a British multinational oil and gas company headquartered in Reading, United Kingdom. On 8 April 2015, Royal Dutch Shell announced that it had reached an agreement to acquire BG Group for $70 billion, subject to regulatory and shareholder agreement. The sale was completed on 15 February 2016. Prior to the takeover, BG Group was listed on the London Stock Exchange and was a constituent of the FTSE 100 Index.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Basra Oil Company Logo Basra Oil Company is a national Iraqi company responsible for the oil in the south of Iraq. It is situated in Basra. BOC is one of the major fundamental formations of the Iraq National Oil Company. It was the first nucleus and the basis of national direct investment projects in the 1970s, where the BOC was subsidiary to the national company. Source
You can download theBOClogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

It was the first nucleus and the basis of national direct investment projects in the 1970s, where the BOC was subsidiary to the national company. Source

Cairn Energy Logo Cairn Energy plc is a British oil and gas exploration and development company and is listed on the London Stock Exchange. Cairn has discovered and extracted oil and gas in a variety of locations around the world. Cairn Energy has a primary listing on the London Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE 250 Index. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Consolidated Contractors Company Logo
Consolidated Contractors Company is the largest construction company in the Middle East and ranks among the top 25 international contractors with a revenue of US$5.3 billion in 2013 and 7.4 billion by 2017. CCC has offices and projects in over 40 countries, and a workforce of 120,000 employees. In April 2019, CCC was engaged in 40 ongoing projects globally. The majority of its sales are in the Middle East. Founded in 1952, this privately held company “offers commercial project management, engineering, procurement, and construction services”, according to Bloomberg.
You can download theCCClogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: CCC
item.description: Consolidated Contractors Company is the largest construction company in the Middle East and ranks among the top 25 international contractors with a revenue of US$5.3 billion in 2013 and 7.4 billion by 2017. CCC has offices and projects in over 40 countries, and a workforce of 120,000 employees. In April 2019, CCC was engaged in 40 ongoing projects globally. The majority of its sales are in the Middle East. Founded in 1952, this privately held company “offers commercial project management, engineering, procurement, and construction services”, according to Bloomberg.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Cenovus Energy Logo
Cenovus Energy Inc. is an integrated oil and natural gas company headquartered in Calgary, Alberta. Cenovus was formed in 2009 when Encana Corporation split into two distinct companies, with Cenovus becoming focused on oil sands assets. In 2017, Cenovus purchased ConocoPhillips' 50 percent share of their Foster Creek Christina Lake oil sands projects and most of their conventional assets in Alberta and British Columbia, including the Deep Basin. Cenovus completed the acquisition of Husky Energy for C$3.
You can download theCenovus Energylogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Cenovus Energy
item.description: Cenovus Energy Inc. is an integrated oil and natural gas company headquartered in Calgary, Alberta. Cenovus was formed in 2009 when Encana Corporation split into two distinct companies, with Cenovus becoming focused on oil sands assets. In 2017, Cenovus purchased ConocoPhillips' 50 percent share of their Foster Creek Christina Lake oil sands projects and most of their conventional assets in Alberta and British Columbia, including the Deep Basin. Cenovus completed the acquisition of Husky Energy for C$3.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Conoco Logo The name Conoco can refer to either a major American brand of oil and gas filling stations that is currently owned by Phillips 66 Co. or to “Conoco Inc.”, a defunct oil and gas company that had operated from 1875 until 2002, when it merged with the Phillips Petroleum Company 66 to form ConocoPhillips. Source
You can download theConocologo on full-version of the page. ]] >

Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Cupet Logo
The Cuba Oil Union ' or CUPET is Cuba’s largest oil company. It is owned and operated by the Cuban national government. The company is involved in the extraction of petroleum deposits as well as the refining and distributing of petroleum products. In conjunction with the conglomerate Cimex, it operates a chain of filling stations selling gasoline in convertible pesos. The extraction is based in Cuba’s northern region of Havana Province.
You can download theCupetlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Cupet
item.description: The Cuba Oil Union ' or CUPET is Cuba’s largest oil company. It is owned and operated by the Cuban national government. The company is involved in the extraction of petroleum deposits as well as the refining and distributing of petroleum products. In conjunction with the conglomerate Cimex, it operates a chain of filling stations selling gasoline in convertible pesos. The extraction is based in Cuba’s northern region of Havana Province.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Devon Energy Logo
Devon Energy Corporation is an American energy company engaged in hydrocarbon exploration in the American market. It is organized in Delaware and its corporate operative headquarters are in the 50-story Devon Energy Center in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma. Its primary operations are in the Barnett Shale, STACK Formation in Oklahoma, Delaware Basin, Eagle Ford Group shale, and the Rocky Mountains. The company is ranked 419th on the Fortune 500. It is not on the Forbes Global 2000.
You can download theDevonlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Devon
item.description: Devon Energy Corporation is an American energy company engaged in hydrocarbon exploration in the American market. It is organized in Delaware and its corporate operative headquarters are in the 50-story Devon Energy Center in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma. Its primary operations are in the Barnett Shale, STACK Formation in Oklahoma, Delaware Basin, Eagle Ford Group shale, and the Rocky Mountains. The company is ranked 419th on the Fortune 500. It is not on the Forbes Global 2000.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Edison Logo Edison S.p.A is an Italian electric utility company headquartered in Milan. The company was established in 1884 and acquired by Electricité de France in 2012. Edison employs more than 5,000 people in Europe, North Africa and the Middle East. Chairman of the board is Jean-Bernard Lévy and chief executive officer is Bruno Lescoeur. Source
You can download theEdisonlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Edison
item.description: Edison S.p.A is an Italian electric utility company headquartered in Milan. The company was established in 1884 and acquired by Electricité de France in 2012. Edison employs more than 5,000 people in Europe, North Africa and the Middle East. Chairman of the board is Jean-Bernard Lévy and chief executive officer is Bruno Lescoeur. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Enbridge Inc. Logo
Enbridge Inc. is a multinational pipeline company headquartered in Calgary, Alberta. It focuses on the transportation of crude oil and natural gas, primarily in North America. Enbridge’s expansive pipeline system is the longest in North America, with over 5,000 kilometres of pipelines in Canada and the United States. Enbridge’s pipelines transport 20% of the natural gas consumed in the United States. It owns and operates Canada’s largest natural gas distribution network, providing distribution services in Ontario and Quebec.
You can download theEnbridgelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Enbridge
item.description: Enbridge Inc. is a multinational pipeline company headquartered in Calgary, Alberta. It focuses on the transportation of crude oil and natural gas, primarily in North America. Enbridge’s expansive pipeline system is the longest in North America, with over 5,000 kilometres of pipelines in Canada and the United States. Enbridge’s pipelines transport 20% of the natural gas consumed in the United States. It owns and operates Canada’s largest natural gas distribution network, providing distribution services in Ontario and Quebec.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
EOG Resources Logo EOG Resources, Inc. is an American energy company engaged in hydrocarbon exploration. It is organized in Delaware and headquartered in the Heritage Plaza building in Houston, Texas. The company is ranked 186th on the Fortune 500 and 337th on the Forbes Global 2000. The company was named Enron Oil & Gas Company before its separation from Enron in 1999. Source
You can download theEOG Resourceslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: EOG Resources
item.description: EOG Resources, Inc. is an American energy company engaged in hydrocarbon exploration. It is organized in Delaware and headquartered in the Heritage Plaza building in Houston, Texas. The company is ranked 186th on the Fortune 500 and 337th on the Forbes Global 2000. The company was named Enron Oil & Gas Company before its separation from Enron in 1999. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Grup Servicii Petroliere Logo
Grup Servicii Petroliere is a Romanian company providing offshore integrated services for oil and gas industry. The company, established in 2004, is a member of UPETROM Group. Grup Servicii Petroliere performs offshore integrated services for the oil and gas industry. GSP is a member of Upetrom Group, a private company. GSP operates seven offshore drilling rigs: GSP Saturn, GSP Jupiter, GSP Orizont, GSP Atlas, GSP Prometeu, GSP Fortuna and GSP Britannia.
You can download theGSPlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: GSP
item.description: Grup Servicii Petroliere is a Romanian company providing offshore integrated services for oil and gas industry. The company, established in 2004, is a member of UPETROM Group. Grup Servicii Petroliere performs offshore integrated services for the oil and gas industry. GSP is a member of Upetrom Group, a private company. GSP operates seven offshore drilling rigs: GSP Saturn, GSP Jupiter, GSP Orizont, GSP Atlas, GSP Prometeu, GSP Fortuna and GSP Britannia.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Gulf Oil Logo
Gulf Oil was a major global oil company from 1901 until March 15, 1985. The eighth-largest American manufacturing company in 1941 and the ninth-largest in 1979, Gulf Oil was one of the so-called Seven Sisters oil companies. Prior to its merger with Standard Oil of California, Gulf was one of the chief instruments of the Mellon family fortune; both Gulf and Mellon Financial had their headquarters in Pittsburgh. Gulf’s former headquarters, originally referred to as “the Gulf Building”, is an Art Deco skyscraper.
You can download theGulflogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Gulf
item.description: Gulf Oil was a major global oil company from 1901 until March 15, 1985. The eighth-largest American manufacturing company in 1941 and the ninth-largest in 1979, Gulf Oil was one of the so-called Seven Sisters oil companies. Prior to its merger with Standard Oil of California, Gulf was one of the chief instruments of the Mellon family fortune; both Gulf and Mellon Financial had their headquarters in Pittsburgh. Gulf’s former headquarters, originally referred to as “the Gulf Building”, is an Art Deco skyscraper.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Hess Logo
Hess Corporation is an American global independent energy company involved in the exploration and production of crude oil and natural gas. It was formed by the merger of Hess Oil and Chemical and Amerada Petroleum in 1968. Leon Hess served as CEO from the early 1960s through 1995, after which his son John B Hess succeeded him as chairman and CEO. Headquartered in New York City, the company ranked 394th in the 2016 annual ranking of Fortune 500 corporations.
You can download theHesslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Hess
item.description: Hess Corporation is an American global independent energy company involved in the exploration and production of crude oil and natural gas. It was formed by the merger of Hess Oil and Chemical and Amerada Petroleum in 1968. Leon Hess served as CEO from the early 1960s through 1995, after which his son John B Hess succeeded him as chairman and CEO. Headquartered in New York City, the company ranked 394th in the 2016 annual ranking of Fortune 500 corporations.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Irving Oil Logo
Irving Oil Ltd. is a Canadian gasoline, oil, and natural gas producing and exporting company. Considered part of the Irving Group of Companies, it was founded by entrepreneur Kenneth “K.C.” Irving and is privately owned by his son, Arthur, and his family. Irving Oil operates Canada’s largest refinery, the Irving Oil Refinery, in Saint John, New Brunswick, and Ireland’s only refinery, in Whitegate, County Cork, as well as a network of gasoline stations, fleet of oil tankers, real estate and other related assets.
You can download theIrving Oillogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Irving Oil
item.description: Irving Oil Ltd. is a Canadian gasoline, oil, and natural gas producing and exporting company. Considered part of the Irving Group of Companies, it was founded by entrepreneur Kenneth “K.C.” Irving and is privately owned by his son, Arthur, and his family. Irving Oil operates Canada’s largest refinery, the Irving Oil Refinery, in Saint John, New Brunswick, and Ireland’s only refinery, in Whitegate, County Cork, as well as a network of gasoline stations, fleet of oil tankers, real estate and other related assets.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
KazMunayGas Logo KazMunayGas is the state-owned oil and gas company of Kazakhstan. It was founded in 2002 by merging Kazakhoil and Oil and Gas Transportation. Source
You can download theKazMunayGaslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: KazMunayGas
item.description: KazMunayGas is the state-owned oil and gas company of Kazakhstan. It was founded in 2002 by merging Kazakhoil and Oil and Gas Transportation. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
MEG Energy Logo
MEG Energy is a pure play Canadian oil sands producer engaged in exploration in Northern Alberta. All of its oil reserves are more than below the surface and so they depend on steam-assisted gravity drainage and associated technology to produce. The company’s main thermal project is Christina Lake. 85-megawatt cogeneration plants are used to produce the steam used in SAGD which is required to bring bitumen to the surface. The excess heat and electricity produced at its plants is then sold to Alberta’s power grid.
You can download theMEG Energylogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: MEG Energy
item.description: MEG Energy is a pure play Canadian oil sands producer engaged in exploration in Northern Alberta. All of its oil reserves are more than below the surface and so they depend on steam-assisted gravity drainage and associated technology to produce. The company’s main thermal project is Christina Lake. 85-megawatt cogeneration plants are used to produce the steam used in SAGD which is required to bring bitumen to the surface. The excess heat and electricity produced at its plants is then sold to Alberta’s power grid.

Motor Oil Hellas Logo Motor Oil, Corinth Refineries S.A. is a petroleum company based in Greece focusing on petroleum refining and trading. It is a leading force in its sector in Southern Europe and the Mediterranean. Source
You can download theMOHlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

<! [CDATA[
Mari Petroleum Company Limited Logo Mari Petroleum Company Limited is one of Pakistan’s largest petroleum exploration and production companies, operating the country’s second largest gas reservoir at Mari Field, District Ghotki, Sindh. MPCL is primarily engaged in exploration, development and production of hydrocarbon products. Source
You can download theMPCLlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: MPCL
item.description: Mari Petroleum Company Limited is one of Pakistan’s largest petroleum exploration and production companies, operating the country’s second largest gas reservoir at Mari Field, District Ghotki, Sindh. MPCL is primarily engaged in exploration, development and production of hydrocarbon products. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Oceaneering International Logo
Oceaneering International, Inc. is a subsea engineering and applied technology company based in Houston, Texas, U.S. that provides engineered services and hardware to customers who operate in marine, space, and other environments. Oceaneering’s business offerings include remotely operated vehicle services, specialty oilfield subsea hardware, deepwater intervention and manned diving services, non-destructive testing and inspections, engineering and project management, and surveying and mapping services. Its services and products are marketed worldwide to oil and gas companies, government agencies, and firms in the aerospace, marine engineering and construction industries.
You can download theOceaneeringlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Oceaneering
item.description: Oceaneering International, Inc. is a subsea engineering and applied technology company based in Houston, Texas, U.S. that provides engineered services and hardware to customers who operate in marine, space, and other environments. Oceaneering’s business offerings include remotely operated vehicle services, specialty oilfield subsea hardware, deepwater intervention and manned diving services, non-destructive testing and inspections, engineering and project management, and surveying and mapping services. Its services and products are marketed worldwide to oil and gas companies, government agencies, and firms in the aerospace, marine engineering and construction industries.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
OMV Logo OMV is an Austrian multinational integrated oil, gas and petrochemical company which is headquartered in Vienna, Austria. The company is listed on the Vienna Stock Exchange. In the 2020 Forbes Global 2000, OMV Group was ranked as the 441st -largest public company in the world. It is active in the oil and gas businesses as well as in petrochemicals. Source
You can download theOMVlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: OMV
item.description: OMV is an Austrian multinational integrated oil, gas and petrochemical company which is headquartered in Vienna, Austria. The company is listed on the Vienna Stock Exchange. In the 2020 Forbes Global 2000, OMV Group was ranked as the 441st -largest public company in the world. It is active in the oil and gas businesses as well as in petrochemicals. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
PKN Orlen Logo PKN Orlen is a Polish oil refiner and petrol retailer. The corporation is a significant European publicly traded firm with major operations in Poland, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Germany, and the Baltic states as well as an operation in Canada. PKN Orlen is the largest company in Central and Eastern Europe and is listed in global rankings such as Fortune Global 500, Platts TOP250 and Thompson Reuters TOP100. Source
You can download theOrlenlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Orlen
item.description: PKN Orlen is a Polish oil refiner and petrol retailer. The corporation is a significant European publicly traded firm with major operations in Poland, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Germany, and the Baltic states as well as an operation in Canada. PKN Orlen is the largest company in Central and Eastern Europe and is listed in global rankings such as Fortune Global 500, Platts TOP250 and Thompson Reuters TOP100. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Pengrowth Energy Logo
Pengrowth Energy Corporation was a Canadian oil and natural gas company based in Calgary, Alberta. Established in 1988 by Calgary entrepreneur James S Kinnear, it was one of the largest of the Canadian royalty trusts, with a market capitalization of US$4.12 billion at the end of 2007. Its assets were approximately evenly distributed between oil and natural gas. Pengrowth’s assets are in the Western Canada sedimentary basin, a geologic region which has a long history of productivity in crude oil and natural gas.
You can download thePengrowthlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Pengrowth
item.description: Pengrowth Energy Corporation was a Canadian oil and natural gas company based in Calgary, Alberta. Established in 1988 by Calgary entrepreneur James S Kinnear, it was one of the largest of the Canadian royalty trusts, with a market capitalization of US$4.12 billion at the end of 2007. Its assets were approximately evenly distributed between oil and natural gas. Pengrowth’s assets are in the Western Canada sedimentary basin, a geologic region which has a long history of productivity in crude oil and natural gas.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
PetroChina Logo
PetroChina Company Limited is a Chinese oil and gas company and is the listed arm of state-owned China National Petroleum Corporation, headquartered in Dongcheng District, Beijing. The company is currently Asia’s largest oil and gas producer and was China’s second biggest oil producer in 2006. Traded in Hong Kong and New York, the mainland enterprise announced its plans to issue stock in Shanghai in November 2007, and subsequently entered the constituent of SSE 50 Index.
You can download thePetroChinalogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: PetroChina
item.description: PetroChina Company Limited is a Chinese oil and gas company and is the listed arm of state-owned China National Petroleum Corporation, headquartered in Dongcheng District, Beijing. The company is currently Asia’s largest oil and gas producer and was China’s second biggest oil producer in 2006. Traded in Hong Kong and New York, the mainland enterprise announced its plans to issue stock in Shanghai in November 2007, and subsequently entered the constituent of SSE 50 Index.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
OMV Petrom Logo OMV Petrom S.A. is a Romanian integrated oil company, controlled by Austria’s OMV. It is one of the largest corporations in Romania and the largest oil and gas producer in Southeast Europe. Since 2004 it is a subsidiary of OMV. Source
You can download thePetromlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Petrom
item.description: OMV Petrom S.A. is a Romanian integrated oil company, controlled by Austria’s OMV. It is one of the largest corporations in Romania and the largest oil and gas producer in Southeast Europe. Since 2004 it is a subsidiary of OMV. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Petron Logo Petron Corporation is the largest oil refining and marketing company in the Philippines, supplying more than a third of the country’s oil requirements. It operates a refinery in Limay, Bataan with a rated capacity of 180,000 barrels per day. From the refinery, Petron moves its products mainly by sea to 32 depots and terminals throughout the country. Source
You can download thePetronlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Petron
item.description: Petron Corporation is the largest oil refining and marketing company in the Philippines, supplying more than a third of the country’s oil requirements. It operates a refinery in Limay, Bataan with a rated capacity of 180,000 barrels per day. From the refinery, Petron moves its products mainly by sea to 32 depots and terminals throughout the country. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
PetroSA Logo
PetroSA is the national oil company of South Africa. Its main activities are the extraction of natural gas from offshore fields about 89 km from Mossel Bay, the production of synthetic fuels from this gas through a gas to liquids process, and the extraction of crude oil from oil fields off the South Coast of South Africa. The GTL Refinery is located in Mossel Bay. Its capacity is about 45 000 bpd and processes both the gas and condensate to produce liquid fuels and chemicals.
You can download thePetroSAlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: PetroSA
item.description: PetroSA is the national oil company of South Africa. Its main activities are the extraction of natural gas from offshore fields about 89 km from Mossel Bay, the production of synthetic fuels from this gas through a gas to liquids process, and the extraction of crude oil from oil fields off the South Coast of South Africa. The GTL Refinery is located in Mossel Bay. Its capacity is about 45 000 bpd and processes both the gas and condensate to produce liquid fuels and chemicals.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Philippine National Oil Company Logo The Philippine National Oil Company is an energy company created on November 9, 1973 as a government-owned and controlled corporation founded under martial law President Ferdinand Marcos' era to supply oil to the Philippines. Since then, its charter has been amended several times to include exploration, exploitation and development of all energy resources in the country. Source
You can download thePNOClogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: PNOC
item.description: The Philippine National Oil Company is an energy company created on November 9, 1973 as a government-owned and controlled corporation founded under martial law President Ferdinand Marcos' era to supply oil to the Philippines. Since then, its charter has been amended several times to include exploration, exploitation and development of all energy resources in the country. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Pakistan Petroleum Logo
Pakistan Petroleum Limited is a Pakistani state-owned multinational petroleum company. It was incorporated on 5 June 1950, when it inherited the assets and liabilities of the Burmah Oil Company Ltd. which initially holds 70% of the share with the rest mostly held by the government of Pakistan. As of June 2011, Government of Pakistan held 70.66% of the shares. The company is headquartered in Karachi. It operates major oil and gas fields, including the Sui gas field, has non-operating interests in other fields, and has an interest in an exploration portfolio onshore and offshore.
You can download thePPLlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: PPL
item.description: Pakistan Petroleum Limited is a Pakistani state-owned multinational petroleum company. It was incorporated on 5 June 1950, when it inherited the assets and liabilities of the Burmah Oil Company Ltd. which initially holds 70% of the share with the rest mostly held by the government of Pakistan. As of June 2011, Government of Pakistan held 70.66% of the shares. The company is headquartered in Karachi. It operates major oil and gas fields, including the Sui gas field, has non-operating interests in other fields, and has an interest in an exploration portfolio onshore and offshore.

<! [CDATA[
Rockhopper Exploration Logo Rockhopper Exploration PLC is an oil and gas exploration company headquartered in Salisbury, Wiltshire, United Kingdom. It owns offshore exploration and production licences in the North Falkland Basin in the waters north of the Falkland Islands. Rockhopper is listed on the Alternative Investment Market of the London Stock Exchange. Source
You can download theRockhopper Explorationlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
ROSEN Group Logo ROSEN Group is a family business, headquartered in Stans, which specializes in the research, development, production, and operation of inspection devices for pipelines and other complex technical systems. The company offers its products and services to the global oil and gas industry as well as other business sectors. In addition, the corporate group develops ‘intelligent plastics' or functional polymers for various applications. Source
You can download theROSENlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

Saipem Logo Saipem S.p.A. is an Italian multinational oilfield services company and one of the largest in the world. Until 2016 it was a subsidiary of Italian oil and gas supermajor Eni, which retains approximately 30% of Saipem’s shares. Source
You can download theSaipemlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

Saras Group Logo Saras S.p.A. is an Italian energy multinational corporation with operations in petroleum refining, marketing, transportation and power generation headquartered in Milan. Its main production plants are located in Sarroch, on the island of Sardinia, Italy. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Sasol Logo
Sasol Limited is an integrated energy and chemical company based in Sandton, South Africa. The company was formed in 1950 in Sasolburg, South Africa and built on processes that were first developed by German chemists and engineers in the early 1900s. Today, Sasol develops and commercialises technologies, including synthetic fuels technologies, and produces different liquid fuels, chemicals and electricity. Sasol is listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange and the New York Stock Exchange.
You can download theSasollogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Sasol
item.description: Sasol Limited is an integrated energy and chemical company based in Sandton, South Africa. The company was formed in 1950 in Sasolburg, South Africa and built on processes that were first developed by German chemists and engineers in the early 1900s. Today, Sasol develops and commercialises technologies, including synthetic fuels technologies, and produces different liquid fuels, chemicals and electricity. Sasol is listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange and the New York Stock Exchange.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Sherritt Logo
Sherritt International is a Canadian resource company, based in Toronto, Ontario. Sherritt is a world leader in the mining and refining of nickel and cobalt – metals essential for the growing adoption of electric vehicles. Its Technologies Group creates innovative, proprietary solutions for oil and mining companies around the world to improve environmental performance and increase economic value. Sherritt is also the largest independent energy producer in Cuba. Sherritt’s common shares are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange under the symbol “S”.
You can download theSherrittlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Sherritt
item.description: Sherritt International is a Canadian resource company, based in Toronto, Ontario. Sherritt is a world leader in the mining and refining of nickel and cobalt – metals essential for the growing adoption of electric vehicles. Its Technologies Group creates innovative, proprietary solutions for oil and mining companies around the world to improve environmental performance and increase economic value. Sherritt is also the largest independent energy producer in Cuba. Sherritt’s common shares are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange under the symbol “S”.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Sonatrach Logo Sonatrach is the national state-owned oil company of Algeria. Founded in 1963, it is known today to be the largest company in Africa with 154 subsidiaries, and often referred as the first African oil “major”. Source
You can download theSonatrachlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Suncor Energy Logo
Suncor Energy is a Canadian integrated energy company based in Calgary, Alberta. It specializes in production of synthetic crude from oil sands. In the 2020 Forbes Global 2000, Suncor Energy was ranked as the 252nd-largest public company in the world. Until 2010, Suncor marketed products and services to retail customers in Ontario through a downstream network of 280 company-owned, and 200 customer-operated retail and Diesel fuel sites, primarily in Ontario under the Sunoco brand.
You can download theSuncor Energylogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

item.description: Suncor Energy is a Canadian integrated energy company based in Calgary, Alberta. It specializes in production of synthetic crude from oil sands. In the 2020 Forbes Global 2000, Suncor Energy was ranked as the 252nd-largest public company in the world. Until 2010, Suncor marketed products and services to retail customers in Ontario through a downstream network of 280 company-owned, and 200 customer-operated retail and Diesel fuel sites, primarily in Ontario under the Sunoco brand.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Tatneft Logo
Tatneft is a Russian vertically integrated oil and gas company with headquarters in the city of Almetyevsk, Republic of Tatarstan, Russian Federation. It is the fifth largest oil company in Russia and the eights largest listed company in Russia by market capitalization. In the 2020 Forbes Global 2000, Tatneft was ranked as the 539th-largest public company in the world. Tatneft holds most of the exploration and production licenses and produces substantially all its crude oil in Tatarstan.
You can download theTatneftlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Tatneft
item.description: Tatneft is a Russian vertically integrated oil and gas company with headquarters in the city of Almetyevsk, Republic of Tatarstan, Russian Federation. It is the fifth largest oil company in Russia and the eights largest listed company in Russia by market capitalization. In the 2020 Forbes Global 2000, Tatneft was ranked as the 539th-largest public company in the world. Tatneft holds most of the exploration and production licenses and produces substantially all its crude oil in Tatarstan.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 TGS-NOPEC Geophysical Company Logo
TGS-NOPEC Geophysical Company ASA, referred to as TGS and listed on the Oslo Stock Exchange, was founded by a 1998 merger of TGS, Calibre Geophysical Co. Inc, and NOPEC International ASA founded in 1981, with financial headquarters in Oslo, Norway and operational headquarters in Houston, Texas. The Company is led by CEO Kristian Johansen with nearly 500 employees around the globe with main offices located in Oslo, Houston, London, and Perth.
You can download theTGSlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: TGS

Inc, and NOPEC International ASA founded in 1981, with financial headquarters in Oslo, Norway and operational headquarters in Houston, Texas. The Company is led by CEO Kristian Johansen with nearly 500 employees around the globe with main offices located in Oslo, Houston, London, and Perth.

<! [CDATA[
Tullow Oil Logo Tullow Oil plc is a multinational oil and gas exploration company founded in Tullow, Ireland with its headquarters in London, United Kingdom. Tullow has a primary listing on the London Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE 250 Index. It has secondary listings on the Ghana Stock Exchange and Irish Stock Exchange. Source
You can download theTullowlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.description: Tullow Oil plc is a multinational oil and gas exploration company founded in Tullow, Ireland with its headquarters in London, United Kingdom. item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Vivo Energy Logo
Vivo Energy plc, commonly referred to as Vivo Energy, is a British downstream petroleum company with its headquarters in London. It maintains subsidiaries and operations in 23 countries across Africa that encompass the supply, storage, distribution, and retail of a range of petroleum products. Vivo Energy is a Royal Dutch Shell and Engen Petroleum licensee and sources, distributes, markets and supplies fuels and lubricants. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and the Johannesburg Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE 250 Index and of the JSE All Share Index.
You can download theVivo Energylogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Vivo Energy
item.description: Vivo Energy plc, commonly referred to as Vivo Energy, is a British downstream petroleum company with its headquarters in London. It maintains subsidiaries and operations in 23 countries across Africa that encompass the supply, storage, distribution, and retail of a range of petroleum products. Vivo Energy is a Royal Dutch Shell and Engen Petroleum licensee and sources, distributes, markets and supplies fuels and lubricants. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and the Johannesburg Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE 250 Index and of the JSE All Share Index.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Whitecap Resources Logo Whitecap Resources is a Canadian public oil company based in Calgary, Alberta, with operations in Alberta, Saskatchewan, and British Columbia. In 2018, it produced 74,415 barrels of energy per day, with 85% of production consisting of crude oil and other liquids. It is listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange. Source
You can download theWhitecap Resourceslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Woodside Petroleum Logo
Woodside Petroleum Ltd is an Australian petroleum exploration and production company. Woodside is the largest operator of oil and gas production in Australia and also Australia’s largest independent dedicated oil and gas company. It is a public company listed on the Australian Securities Exchange and has its headquarters in Perth, Western Australia. In the 2020 Forbes Global 2000, Woodside Petroleum was ranked as the 1328th -largest public company in the world.
You can download theWoodsidelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Woodside
item.description: Woodside Petroleum Ltd is an Australian petroleum exploration and production company. Woodside is the largest operator of oil and gas production in Australia and also Australia’s largest independent dedicated oil and gas company. It is a public company listed on the Australian Securities Exchange and has its headquarters in Perth, Western Australia. In the 2020 Forbes Global 2000, Woodside Petroleum was ranked as the 1328th -largest public company in the world.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Bharat Petroleum Logo Bharat Petroleum Corporation Limited is an Indian government-owned oil and gas corporation. It is under the ownership of Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas, Government of India, headquartered in Mumbai, Maharashtra. It operates two large refineries in Kochi and Mumbai. India’s second-largest downstream oil company, it was ranked 309th on the 2020 Fortune list of the world’s biggest corporations, and 792nd on Forbes’s 2021 “Global 2000” list. Source
You can download theBharat Petroleumlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Bharat Petroleum

It is under the ownership of Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas, Government of India, headquartered in Mumbai, Maharashtra. It operates two large refineries in Kochi and Mumbai. India’s second-largest downstream oil company, it was ranked 309th on the 2020 Fortune list of the world’s biggest corporations, and 792nd on Forbes’s 2021 “Global 2000” list. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Hindustan Petroleum Logo
Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of Oil and Natural Gas Corporation with its headquarters in Mumbai, Maharashtra. It has a 25% market-share in India among public sector undertakings coupled with a strong marketing infrastructure. Its parent company is ONGC which owns a majority stake in the company. The company is ranked 367th on the Fortune Global 500 list of the world’s biggest corporations as of 2016. HPCL was removed from NIFTY 50 INDEX in March 2019 On 24 October 2019, the company became a Maharatna PSU.
You can download theHindustan Petroleumlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Hindustan Petroleum
item.description: Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of Oil and Natural Gas Corporation with its headquarters in Mumbai, Maharashtra. It has a 25% market-share in India among public sector undertakings coupled with a strong marketing infrastructure. Its parent company is ONGC which owns a majority stake in the company. The company is ranked 367th on the Fortune Global 500 list of the world’s biggest corporations as of 2016. HPCL was removed from NIFTY 50 INDEX in March 2019 On 24 October 2019, the company became a Maharatna PSU.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Indian Oil Logo
Indian Oil Corporation Limited, d/b/a IndianOil, is an Indian government-owned oil and gas corporation. It is under the ownership of Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas, Government of India headquartered in New Delhi. It is the largest commercial oil company in the country, with a net profit of ₹43,242 crore for the financial year 2020-21. It is ranked 2nd in Fortune India 500 list for year 2020 and 151st in Fortune Global 500 list of world’s largest companies in the year 2020.
You can download theIndian Oillogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Indian Oil
item.description: Indian Oil Corporation Limited, d/b/a IndianOil, is an Indian government-owned oil and gas corporation. It is under the ownership of Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas, Government of India headquartered in New Delhi. It is the largest commercial oil company in the country, with a net profit of ₹43,242 crore for the financial year 2020-21. It is ranked 2nd in Fortune India 500 list for year 2020 and 151st in Fortune Global 500 list of world’s largest companies in the year 2020.

Hinduja Group Logo Hinduja Group is an Anglo-Indian transnational conglomerate based in Mumbai, India and headquartered in London, United Kingdom. The group is present in eleven sectors including Automotives, Oil and Specialty Chemicals, Banking and Finance, IT & ITeS, Cyber Security, Healthcare, Trading, Infrastructure Project Development, Media & Entertainment, Power, Real Estate. Source
